title: The House MD font!?
content:
Help!

I think I'm going to go mad with frustration!

Does anyone know what the font is for the tv show House MD?

A quick google search had folks at Myfonts saying it was Futura demi, Century Gothic or Twentieth Century. I don't know whether its a mixture of them all or that the font was adapted. I will keep searching but thought I'd ask here to see whether anyone knew it.

Bec.

[http://www.quickstopentertainment.com/wp-content/uploads/2006/09/housetitle.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310032252/http:/www.quickstopentertainment.com/wp-content/uploads/2006/09/housetitle.jpg)
author: Redbec

comments.content:
\>Does anyone know what the font is for the tv show House MD?

It started out as Gill Sans, but someone changed the accents to make it look like Franklin Gothic.
